Get ESPN's WNBA play by play data

Source: R/espn_wnba_data.R
espn_wnba_pbp.Rd

Get ESPN's WNBA play by play data

espn_wnba_pbp(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

Returns a play-by-play data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples


# \donttest{
  try(espn_wnba_pbp(game_id = 401244185))
#> # A tibble: 388 × 20
